page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: _Over half the families have only 2 children and several have only 1 child. More families have 1 child than 3 children. There are approximately 14 pre-school children 34 primary school children approximately 20 secondary school children. Most houses have only 2 adults there but a few have working young people at home.More people have moved here than were born here.Few fathers work in Green Hammerton they travel to Knaresbrough,York,Harrogate or Leeds.Many mothers have part time jobs in the village or at Whixley. Most people go to work by car. A very small number travel by bus or cycle. Green Hammerton has only one shop/post office,important for people who have no car. For big supermarket shops, clothes,dentists and opticians we have to go to York, Borobridge, Knaresbrough or Harrogate or Leeds.
